title: a poem about a champion who's op
body:
Never before have i seen such a force.
Enough power to stop a whole team
R can change a whole team fight just pressing it
Forget about grouping. you will lose the team fight no matter what

Any time he is locked in be ready to s@20
Much too many in his kit. certainly overloaded
Umbrellas won't help when this guy rains on your whole team
Monsters and minions are cleared with ease
Uninstall if you main him
